problem.markdown: What is the goal of caching within computers? ( ) To make selected programs run quickly ( ) To give the appearance that there is infinite memory ( ) To make CPU intensive programs run quickly (x) To give the appearance that everything runs as fast as the fastest type of memory
problem.p: What is the goal of caching within computers?

choicegroup.choice: To make selected programs run quickly
To give the appearance that there is infinite memory
To make CPU intensive programs run quickly
To give the appearance that everything runs as fast as the fastest type of memory
